title: Patriots Launch "Trophy Tour"
text:

(PR) Bridgewater, NJ- The Somerset Patriots have launched Trophy Tour to give partners and fans a chance to celebrate the 2015 Atlantic League Championship throughout the community. 
Trophy Tour will bring the Atlantic League Championship Trophy to different partner locations and community events in the area for viewing and pictures. At select events, local players and Sparkee The Mascot will be in attendance to add to the festivities. 
It is the first time the Somerset Patriots are holding a Trophy Tour for fans to help celebrate the teamâ€™s championship. 
Throughout Trophy Tour, the Somerset Patriots encourage participating fans to take pictures with the trophy and post them on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram using #trophytour to share their experiences. 
Trophy Tour will kick off on Thursday, October 22nd at WCTC 1450 AM, located at 78 Veronica Avenue in Somerset, from 8:00 am to 11:00 am. Team representatives will be on air with morning show host Bert Baron from 8:00 am to 9:00 am to talk about the 2015 season. 
Fans will be able to check on upcoming Trophy Tour events on the Somerset Patriots website www.somersetpatriots.com. 
Any partners or organizations looking to host a Trophy Tour stop at their location or event should contact the Somerset Patriots by e-mailing Marc Russinoff at mrussinoff@somersetpatriots.com. 
The Somerset Patriots won their Atlantic League leading sixth championship during the 2015 season. The schedule for 2016 is currently in the works and will be announced in the coming weeks. For more information about the 2016 season, visit www.somersetpatriots.com.
